description.schinese: 出类拔萃地完成以下国家间的运输任务：俄罗斯 - 立陶宛；立陶宛 - 拉脱维亚；拉脱维亚 - 爱沙尼亚；爱沙尼亚 - 俄罗斯；俄罗斯 - 芬兰。任何顺序或方向均可 （需要 Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC）

description.english: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.german: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.french: Visitez les points de repère et lieux suivants : Iron Gates, Château de Bran (Roumanie), plage Pomorie, Wall of Heroes à Varna (Bulgarie), Lac de Küçükçekmece à Istanbul (Turquie) (requiert le DLC Road to the Black Sea)
description.italian: Visita i seguenti luoghi e punti di riferimento: Porte di Ferro, castello di Bran (Romania), spiaggia di Pomorie, Muro degli Eroi a Varna (Bulgaria) e il lago Küçükçekmece a Istanbul (Turchia) (DLC Road to the Black Sea richiesto)
description.koreana: 명시된 랜드마크와 지역을 방문하십시오: 아이언 게이트, 브란성 (루마니아) / 포모리에 해변, 바르나에 있는 영웅의 벽 (불가리아) / 이스탄불에 있는 쿠쿡섹메세 호수 (튀르키예) (Road to the Black Sea DLC 가 필요함)
description.spanish: Visita Puertas de Hierro, el castillo de Bran, la playa de Pomorie, el muro de Héroes y Küçükçekmece (Road to the Black Sea)
description.schinese: 到访以下地标和地点：铁门峡谷、布兰城堡（罗马尼亚）；波莫里埃沙滩、瓦尔纳的英雄墙（保加利亚）；伊斯坦布尔的小切克梅杰湖（土耳其） （需要 Road to the Black Sea DLC）
description.tchinese: 造訪以下的地標和地點: 鐵門（多瑙河）、布蘭城堡（羅馬尼亞）、波摩萊海灘、瓦爾納英雄牆（保加利亞）、伊斯坦堡庫科切梅切湖（土耳其） （需要 Road to the Black Sea DLC）
description.russian: Посетить достопримечательности: Железные Ворота, замок Бран (Румыния), пляж Поморие, Стену Героев в Варне (Болгария), озеро Кючюкчекмедже в Стамбуле (Турция) (требуется наличие дополнения Road to the Black Sea)
description.japanese: 次に挙げるランドマークや場所を訪問した： 鉄門とブラン城(ルーマニア)、ポリモエビーチとヴァルナのWall of Heroes(ブルガリア)、イスタンブールのキュチュクチェクメジェ湖(トルコ) (要 Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.portuguese: Visita os seguintes monumentos e localizações: Portões de Ferro, Castelo de Bran (Roménia), Praia de Pomorie, Muro dos Heróis em Varna (Bulgária), Lago Küçükçekmece em Istambul (Turquia) (requer o DLC Road to the Black Sea)
description.polish: Odwiedź następujące zabytki i miejsca: Żelazna Brama, Zamek Bran (Rumunia), Plaża Pomorie, Mur Bohaterów w Warnie (Bułgaria), Jezioro Küçükçekmece w Stambule (Turcja) (wymaga DLC Road to the Black Sea)
description.danish: Besøg følgende vartegn og steder: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Rumænien), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes i Varna (Bulgarien), Lake Küçükçekmece i Istanbul (Tyrkiet) (kræver Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.dutch: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.finnish: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.norwegian: Besøk følgende landemerker og lokasjoner: Jernporten, Bran slott (Romania), Pomorie strand, Veggen av helter i Varna (Bulgaria), Küçükçekmece-innsjøen i Istanbul (Tyrkia) (krever Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.swedish: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (kräver Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.hungarian: Látogasd meg a következő látványosságokat: a Vaskapu-szorost és a törcsvári kastélyt (Románia), a pomoriei szabadstrandot és a várnai Hősök falát (Bulgária), illetve az isztambuli Küçükçekmecei-tavat (Törökország). (A Road to the Black Sea DLC megléte szükséges.)
description.czech: Navštiv následující památky a oblasti: Železná vrata, hrad Bran (Rumunsko), pláž v Pomorie, Zeď hrdinů ve Varně (Bulharsko) a jezero Küçükçekmece v Istanbulu (Turecko) (vyžaduje DLC Road to the Black Sea)
description.romanian: Vizitați următoarele repere și locații: Porțile de Fier, Castelul Bran (România), Plaja Pomorie, Zidul Eroilor din Varna (Bulgaria), Lacul Küçükçekmece din Istanbul (Turcia) (necesită Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.turkish: Şu önemli mekân ve konumları keşfedin: Demirkapı, Bran Kalesi (Romanya), Pomorie Kumsalı, Varna'daki Kahramanlar Duvarı (Bulgaristan), İstanbul'daki Küçükçekmece Gölü (Türkiye) (Road to the Black Sea DLC'sini gerektirir)
description.brazilian: Visite os seguintes pontos turísticos e locais: Portões de Ferro, Castelo de Bran (Romênia), Praia de Pomorie, Muro dos Heróis em Varna (Bulgária), Lago Küçükçekmece em Istambul (Turquia) (requer a DLC Road to the Black Sea)
description.bulgarian: Посетете следните забележителности и местности: Железните порти, замъка Бран (Румъния), плажа в Поморие, Стената на героите във Варна (България), езерото Кючукчекмедже в Истанбул (Турция) (изисква DLC „Пътят към Черно море“)
description.greek: Επισκέψου τα παρακάτω αξιοθέατα και τοποθεσίες: Σιδηρές Πύλες, Κάστρο Μπραν (Ρουμανία), Παραλία Αγχιάλου, Τοίχος των Ηρώων στη Βάρνα (Βουλγαρία), Λίμνη Κιουτσουκτσεμετζέ στην Κωνσταντινούπολη (Τουρκία) (απαιτείται το Road to the Black Sea DLC)
description.ukrainian: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

(A West Balkans DLC megléte szükséges.)
